mapper.sql: online_id, base_id, prod_id, ver_code, rel_id, rel_dtl_id, module_id, is_onsite_support, is_remote_support, plan_online_date, online_date, is_fault, is_onlined, un_online_reason, delay_online_date, online_remark, delete_flag, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into mnt_install_online_info ( base_id, prod_id, ver_code, rel_id, rel_dtl_id, module_id, is_onsite_support, is_remote_support, plan_online_date, online_date, is_fault, is_onlined, un_online_reason, delay_online_date, online_remark, delete_flag, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date ) values ( #{baseId}, #{prodId}, #{verCode}, #{relId}, #{relDtlId}, #{moduleId}, #{isOnsiteSupport}, #{isRemoteSupport}, #{planOnlineDate}, #{onlineDate}, #{isFault}, #{isOnlined}, #{unOnlineReason}, #{delayOnlineDate}, #{onlineRemark}, #{deleteFlag}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{modifier}, #{modifyDate} )

insert into mnt_install_online_info ( base_id, prod_id, ver_code, rel_id, rel_dtl_id, module_id, is_onsite_support, is_remote_support, plan_online_date, online_date, is_fault, is_onlined, un_online_reason, delay_online_date, online_remark, delete_flag, creator, create_date, modifier, modify_date ) values
( #{item.baseId}, #{item.prodId}, #{item.verCode}, #{item.relId}, #{item.relDtlId}, #{item.moduleId}, #{item.isOnsiteSupport}, #{item.isRemoteSupport}, #{item.planOnlineDate}, #{item.onlineDate}, #{item.isFault}, #{item.isOnlined}, #{item.unOnlineReason}, #{item.delayOnlineDate}, #{item.onlineRemark}, #{item.deleteFlag}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifyDate} )
mapper.update:
update mnt_install_online_info
base_id = #{baseId},
prod_id = #{prodId},
ver_code = #{verCode},
rel_id = #{relId},
rel_dtl_id = #{relDtlId},
module_id = #{moduleId},
is_onsite_support = #{isOnsiteSupport},
is_remote_support = #{isRemoteSupport},
plan_online_date = #{planOnlineDate},
online_date = #{onlineDate},
is_fault = #{isFault},
is_onlined = #{isOnlined},
un_online_reason = #{unOnlineReason},
delay_online_date = #{delayOnlineDate},
online_remark = #{onlineRemark},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
creator = #{creator},
create_date = #{createDate},
modifier = #{modifier},
modify_date = #{modifyDate}
where online_id = #{onlineId}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN online_date IS NOT NULL THEN online_date WHEN delay_online_date IS NOT NULL THEN delay_online_date WHEN plan_online_date IS NOT NULL THEN plan_online_date END online_date from mnt_install_online_info
and ((plan_online_date >= #{beginDate} and plan_online_date <= #{endDate}) or (online_date >= #{beginDate} and online_date <= #{endDate}) or (delay_online_date >= #{beginDate} and delay_online_date <= #{endDate}))
